title: Michele Bachmann
summary: Michele Marie Bachmann (/ˈbɑːxmən/; née Amble; born April 6, 1956)[1] is an American politician who was the U.S. Representative for Minnesota's 6th congressional district from 2007 until 2015. A member of the Republican Party, she was a candidate for President of the United States in the 2012 election, but lost the Republican nomination to Mitt Romney.
